price: Whenever they bring you an argument, We bring you the truth and the best explanation.
arabic: وَلَا يَأۡتُونَكَ بِمَثَلٍ إِلَّا جِئۡنَٰكَ بِٱلۡحَقِّ وَأَحۡسَنَ تَفۡسِيرًا

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
